metadata.description:
The whole family sits in the Puja seeking blessings from Lord Ganesh. The Prayers continue for around 1 hour. Here, the bride and her parents are doing Ganesh Aarti.
They are sitting on the customised Gaadi Moda, which is handmade-zardozi work. All the females wear rakhdi and yellow, and the men of the house wear a yellow turban. It is a specific turban worn by the Mewadi Rajput family known as the Mewadi paag.
metadata.name: #1 Ganpati Aarti
